attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nearly half of car owners will be paying 44% more for our road fund licence (TAX) next year.For example, if you own a 1.8 ford mondeo. form April 2009 you will be paying £260 to tax it. An increase of £90. The Dictators say it is an environmental tax. I say it is stealing more money from us.
Why do we put up with it?
Sign this petition and let them know how hacked off you are with them and our joke of a PM.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
